1.Title: Static Charge
1.Description: When Soldier 0 - Anby uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to hit an enemy, it triggers the additional DMG from <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> 3 times. This effect does not consume any <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> stacks.
1.Lore:
"Please keep my business here a secret from Nicole and the others."
"Alright. Are you sleeping on the couch downstairs or upstairs?"
"...Proxy... Thank you."

2.Title: Fail-Safe Protocol
2.Description: Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT Rate increases by 12%. When she uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 6 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color> (max 6 stacks). With <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color>, when using <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Azure Flash</color> to hit an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>, it will consume 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color> instead. Only 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color> will be consumed when a single use of a skill hits multiple enemies, and consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color> will still activate the additional DMG from <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>.
2.Lore:
"What's wrong? You look really tired."
"I'm... fine."
"If you need help, just say the word."

3.Title: Past Glory
3.Lore:
"Anby, we were just talking about you. Are you really okay?"
"I... I'm..."
"If you try to brush it off with 'I'm fine' again, I might not be so kind."
"What does 'not being kind' from you look like, Proxy?"

4.Title: Silver Reverb
4.Description: When hitting an enemy marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, Soldier 0 - Anby ignores 12% of the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color>.
4.Lore:
"Anby, you just came back from the Hollow. Do you want to take a shower?"
"You go ahead, Proxy. I still need to organize some information..."
"Ha."
"Hmm?"
"Why do I feel like Anby has been living in this house for a long time..."

5.Title: Director's Cut
5.Lore:
"I get it now. About Anby and Silver Squad..."
"Sorry. I never meant for all of this to become your burden, Proxy."
"So — what movie do you feel like watching tonight?"
"Huh...?"
"Your troubles will never be a burden. See? Normal life can go on as usual."

6.Title: Prequel Protagonist
6.Description: Upon triggering 6 instances of <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>'s additional DMG, an electromagnetic vortex will be generated, dealing 1,000% of Soldier 0 - Anby's ATK as <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> against the target and surrounding enemies. This DMG is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG.
6.Lore:
"Well... I should be heading back, Proxy. Thanks for everything you've done for me."
"I know you promised Nicole you wouldn't run away from home again, but isn't this a little unfair to me?
—I miss those days when you and I would watch movies together until dawn."
"Unfair... to you? Well, I'll just have to come up with a way to make up for it."
"Hurry up and think of something."
"Soldier 0, at your service... Huh, huh...?"

DescriptionByLevel.1: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by <color=#2BAD00>12.5%</color>. After an enemy is marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, the CRIT DMG received from <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attacks is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.
DescriptionByLevel.2: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color>. After an enemy is marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, the CRIT DMG received from <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attacks is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>17.5%</color> of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.
DescriptionByLevel.3: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by <color=#2BAD00>16.5%</color>. After an enemy is marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, the CRIT DMG received from <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attacks is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.
DescriptionByLevel.4: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by <color=#2BAD00>18.8%</color>. After an enemy is marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, the CRIT DMG received from <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attacks is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>22.5%</color> of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.
DescriptionByLevel.5: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by <color=#2BAD00>20.8%</color>. After an enemy is marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, the CRIT DMG received from <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attacks is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.
DescriptionByLevel.6: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by <color=#2BAD00>23%</color>. After an enemy is marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, the CRIT DMG received from <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attacks is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>27.5%</color> of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.
DescriptionByLevel.7: Soldier 0 - Anby's DMG against enemies with the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>. After an enemy is marked with <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>, the CRIT DMG received from <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attacks is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color> of Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT DMG.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Voltage Surge
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character:
Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT Rate increases by 10%. When Soldier 0 - Anby is the active character, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG to enemies with a <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark increases by 25%.

138100001.Title: Basic Attack: Penetrating Shock
138100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform up to five slashes ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>. After the 4th attack hits the enemy, repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to quickly pass through enemies in front up to 5 times.

138100002.Title: Special Attack: Celestial Thunder
138100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Dash diagonally forward, then unleash a cross slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

138100003.Title: Special Attack: Azure Flash
138100003.Description:
When Soldier 0 - Anby's attacks hit an enemy, they apply the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark and charges the target 
For every one-third of charge, the enemy receives 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>, stacking up to 3 times.
When the enemy has <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly dash forward, slashing through enemies and dealing multiple hits of <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will consume 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> to trigger an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> that deals 1 extra instance of <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100004.Title: Special Attack: Thunder Smite
138100004.Description:
When the additional damage from <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> triggers 3 times on the same enemy:
A lightning strike will fall at the enemy's location, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> to enemies within range.
This DMG is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG.

138100005.Title: EX Special Attack: Sundering Bolt
138100005.Description:
With enough energy, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Combines her twin swords and throws them forward for a high-speed slash, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will fully charge <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100006.Title: Dodge: Strobe
138100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100007.Title: Dash Attack: Torrent
138100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Perform a horizontal slash forward, then follow up with a thrust attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

138100008.Title: Dodge Counter: Ground Flash Counter
138100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Repeatedly slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100009.Title: Chain Attack: Leaping Thunderstrike
138100009.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Leap forward, then quickly dive and perform a cross slash, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100010.Title: Ultimate: Voidstrike
138100010.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Perform a powerful series of slashes at a large area in front, followed by a lightning strike, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will fully charge <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100012.Title: Quick Assist: Cloud Flash
138100012.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Repeatedly slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100013.Title: Defensive Assist: Counter Surge
138100013.Description:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

138100014.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Conducting Blow
138100014.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Dash forward and unleash a series of slashes at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
